name: Space Pirate Trainer
description: Space Pirate Trainer is the official trainer for wannabe space pirates in VR. Pick up your blasters, put on your sneakers, and dance your way into the Space Pirate Trainer hall of fame.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 or higher Processor: intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 7 or higher Processor: intel i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
